HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: From 99 Kč. Free for orders over 1990 Kč.

express_delivery.pricing: From 169 Kč (Česká pošta - Balík Do ruky - sobotní doručení)

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: From 79 Kč. Free for orders over 1990 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: From 79 Kč. Free for orders over 1990 Kč.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery, Parcel Shops/Lockers, and In-Store Pickup are available. PROVIDERS: Česká pošta, PPL, and Zásilkovna. PRICING: Starts at 79 Kč for pickup points and 99 Kč for home delivery. Free shipping is offered on orders over 1990 Kč, excluding bulky items. In-store pickup in Třinec is free. NOTABLE FEATURES: Saturday delivery is available via Česká pošta and PPL. COD is available for a surcharge (39 Kč for standard, 30 Kč for bulky). Bulky items like snowboards have specific shipping rules and costs (100-130 Kč) and cannot be sent to Zásilkovna points. In-store pickup is restricted to items in stock at the warehouse. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly presented on a dedicated page with a detailed price table and explanations for each service. It is comprehensive, easy to understand, and covers all necessary details like delivery times, payment options, and special conditions for bulky goods.
